com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync

Class PVEData.TotalPVEEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wolvencraft.yasp.db.data.sync.PVEData.TotalPVEEntry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataStore.NormalData
    Enclosing class:
    PVEData

    public class PVEData.TotalPVEEntry
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataStore.NormalData
    Represents an entry in the PVE data store. It is dynamic, i.e. it can be edited once it has been created.
    Author:
    bitWolfy
